parameters.jsCode: const searchStrategy = { keywords: { brand: ['utribe', 'your-company'], category: ['automation tool', 'workflow builder', 'no-code platform', 'process automation'], painPoints: ['manual processes', 'repetitive tasks', 'workflow bottlenecks', 'team productivity'], competitors: ['zapier', 'make.com', 'n8n', 'automate.io', 'microsoft power automate'] }, searchQueries: [ 'automation tool reviews 2024', 'workflow automation pain points', 'zapier alternatives', 'no-code automation platforms', 'business process automation tools' ], businessContext: 'We are a workflow automation platform helping businesses eliminate manual processes and boost productivity' }; return [{ json: searchStrategy }];

const allInputs = $input.all(); const aggregatedData = { timestamp: new Date().toISOString(), sources: { google: allInputs.find(item => item.json.items) || {}, youtube: allInputs.find(item => item.json.items && item.json.items[0]?.id?.videoId) || {}, twitter: allInputs.find(item => item.json.data) || {} }, totalDataPoints: allInputs.length, searchContext: allInputs[0]?.json || {} }; return [{ json: aggregatedData }];

const data = $json; const prompt = `You are an expert competitive intelligence analyst. Analyze the following multi-platform data and provide a comprehensive report: GOOGLE SEARCH: ${JSON.stringify(data.sources.google, null, 2)} YOUTUBE CONTENT: ${JSON.stringify(data.sources.youtube, null, 2)} TWITTER SENTIMENT: ${JSON.stringify(data.sources.twitter, null, 2)} BUSINESS CONTEXT: We are a workflow automation platform competing with tools like Zapier and Make.com. Provide analysis in this JSON format: { "painPoints": ["top 5 customer pain points"], "personas": ["primary customer segments with descriptions"], "competitors": ["key competitors with positioning analysis"], "marketSentiment": "overall market sentiment and trends", "opportunities": ["specific opportunities for our platform"], "recommendations": ["actionable strategic recommendations"] }`; return [{ json: { prompt, analysisData: data } }];

const aiResponse = $json.choices[0].message.content; let aiAnalysis; try { aiAnalysis = JSON.parse(aiResponse); } catch (e) { aiAnalysis = { error: 'Failed to parse AI response', rawResponse: aiResponse }; } const report = { reportDate: new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0], executiveSummary: `Daily competitive intelligence scan completed. Analyzed multiple data sources across Google, YouTube, and Twitter.`, insights: aiAnalysis, dataQuality: { sourcesAnalyzed: 3, timestamp: new Date().toISOString() }, nextActions: aiAnalysis.recommendations || [] }; return [{ json: report }];
